## [ConnectionSite](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/connection-site)

### Methods

|                                                     Method                                                      |                                      Return type                                       |                      Brief description                      |
|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------|
| [getIndex()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/connection-site#getIndex())             | `Integer`                                                                              | Returns the index of the connection site.                   |
| [getPageElement()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/connection-site#getPageElement()) | [PageElement](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/page-element) | Returns the `Page``Element` that the connection site is on. |
